ovdesc.p: This file is used for raising charges for all transactions.

desc.p: Description for the table, free field.

"Stores the type of charge. ONLINE or PARAM or RTN. ONLINE - Amount will be taken from the ISO Message position defined in FLD.POS.RTN field.PARAM - Amount and other fields has to be configured for raising entries.RTN Routine has to be attached for raising charges
If ONLINE is selected in above field, ISO field position should be mentioned to get the charge amount. If RTN is selected above, then Routine has to be attached here with @ before the routine name.
Stores the Charge ID rule. Rule id can be: MTI or PROC or BIN or MTI.PROC or MTI.PROC.CCY or MTI.PROC.BIN.CCY
Description for the table, free field.
YES or NO. If set to YES. Separate FT will be raised else the data provided below will be sent in the Main OFS Request.
Message Type Indicator of the ISO Message.
Processing Code for the ISO Message.
BIN No which has to be charged.
Stores the Currency.
This field stores the record Id which will be created in ATM.SPLIT.CHG.TABLE
Stores the Amount to be charged.
Stores the charge Amount position.
Stores the Percentage of amount to be charged.
Stores the Commission type record name.
Stores whether the Account type is CUST or IA.
Stores the Debit Account Number.
Stores the Credit Account Number.
For future use for local references.
Reserved fields for future use.
